question: What is the longest-wavelength electronic transition in each of the following species? Use molecular-orbital designations such as $\ce{\pi -> \pi^*}$,$\ce{\pi_1 -> \pi_2}$ in your answer.  **(a)** 2-Propenyl (allyl) cation; **(b)** 2-propenyl (allyl) radical; **(c)** formaldehyde, $\ce{H_2C=O}$; **(d)** $\ce{N_2}$; **(e)**1,3,5-hexatriene.
